Welcome to my website! I am a statistics student at Cal Poly SLO. I enjoy statistics and working with data, and I am on a path forward towards a great career. My hobbies include running, travel, guitar, and reading.

Skills/Relevant coursework: SAS, JMP, R, Python, Tableau, Excel, Word, Statistical Computing in R, Statistical Computing in SAS, Linear Algebra, Methods of Proof, Probability Theory, Calculus I-IV, Applied Linear Models, Multilevel and Mixed Modeling, Survey Sampling and Methodology.
